0.text: Can I have a high five?

8.text:
It's one of the most star studded events on
the showbiz calender and we've been lucky

12.text:
enough to get ourselves an invite. Yes, we're
here at the British Academy Television Awards

15.text:
here in London but before we hit that awesome
after party, let's catch up with some of tonight's stars.

21.text:
Hi Aaron, Andrea from ITN. Lovely to meet
you.

25.text:
You're having a great time, I've seen you
hanging out with One Direction and David Beckham.

32.text:
Yeah, it's been fun. They're great. Such cool
guys! Really, and so down to Earth and I mean

39.text:
I'm so happy for them. I'm so glad they're not,
like, little punks, you know what I mean?

45.text: Gotta go to one of their shows!

47.text:
- Yeah, everywhere!
- Let's go! Let's go together!

50.text:
Now, with your magic, can you make yourself
win the awards?

53.text:
I probably could, but, if we do win, I like
it to be on its own merit, you know.

58.text:
But you actually could, you reckon, with your
magic?

60.text:
- I reckon you could
- Possibly. I could do anything, man.

61.text: Can you? Can you do anything right now?

64.text:
I probably could. I can disappear up the red
carpet.

66.text:
Are you a fan of fish and chips and a pint?
Would you like that?

69.text:
Y'know, I wouldn't be able to tell you were
to get the best fish and chips.

74.text:
-No way, you've got to get some fish and chips!
-No, I'm not that guy.

76.text:
I could tell you that I've seen some of the
best theatre that I've ever seen in my entire life here.

80.text:
But I can't tell you where-
You've got to try our grub. Amazing pies here

84.text:
You know, if I was out having adult beverages
and fish and chips every night, I wouldn't

87.text: be able to be Mr. Selfridge so I've gotta-

90.text: I'll take you out in Chelsea as well.

92.text: Let's do it. Chelsea it is.

97.text:
You look amazing, what's the secret, Cilla,
to looking so good?

101.text:
I don't know. I wish it was botox, but I'm...
No, I don't have botax... tox... Botox is

112.text:
Yeah, I don't have anything like that. I don't...
champagne.

122.text:
So, after a fun filled red carpet, it was
awards time. So, who took home the gongs?

128.text:
Well, to name a few, Broadchurch lead the
way, winning three BAFTAs. The I.T. Crowd

134.text:
took home two awards. Cilla Black was presented
with the special award. And our favourite

139.text:
Geordies, Ant & Dec, picked up two BAFTAs
for their show Ant & Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway.

145.text:
So how do Ant & Dec celebrate? What do you
guys do?

148.text:
- Well, we're gonna got to-
- There'll be drinking. There'll be dancing.

152.text:
We're gonna go and have the dinner now, we're
gonna go to the after show party and then

156.text:
we're getting picked up in the morning, we're
going to play golf.

159.text:
Yeah. We're going to go play golf in the
sunshine tomorrow.

161.text:
We should try and squeeze these and put
them in the golf bags.

164.text:
Just be like, hey guys! Just won a couple
of BAFTAs.

166.text:
- We'll just put it on the front of the buggy...
- Should I use a sand iron or my BAFTA?

170.text:
Yes! Please promise me you'll golf with that,
please. You have to do it!

175.text: I'm gonna do that. I'm gonna tweet a picture.

179.text:
- You must feel pretty awesome about yourselves.
- I mean look. It's pretty big.

182.text: I mean, you had to ask?

184.text: That's not what I was getting at!

185.text: Well, you know, that's how I took it.
